Choro Bandido is a Surrey based four piece band, brought together through friendship and their mutual love of Brazilian samba.  Between them they play a wealth of instruments including struhviol and cavaquino, as well as the usual Latin line-up! They have a wealth of musical experience in many styles and are now entertaining audiences with Choro, and other music from Latin America and beyond.
chorobandido.co.uk

fields.content:
The Light Keepers are a five-piece musical collective from the South Coast of England, where the waves crash and the seabirds fly. We make vintage, rootsy, folky, soulful sounds and play brand new original songs about life, love and longing - as well as eclectic covers including songs by Tom Waits, Van Morrison, vintage gospel, blues and wartime tunes. Celebrating the past, singing for a better now. 

"As if the English invented Americana." 
The Independent on Sunday
fields.excerpt: 20.30.  Free entry
fields.title: The Light Keepers

fields.content: Stormy-T and Bluesman’s Lane are a four piece Hastings based Blues Band, playing traditional rhythm and blues, swing, blues and funk from the 1930’s to the 2000s.  The Band was formed in 2018 due to a mutual love of the more traditional blues & swing music, and since playing their first gig in July of 2018 have built up a big following and reputation for getting their audiences singing and dancing!

fields.content:
Roswell: 'A folk duo whose voices combine to create a seamless flow of rich, harmonic beauty' ~ Americana UK.

Harmony-loving multi-instrumentalists Zoё Wren and Jasmine Watkiss formed Roswell at an open mic in Cambridgeshire in 2018. The Americana/ Folk duo have several awards under their belt, including Purbeck Rising 2018 and Fatea EP of the Year Award 2019 for their debut EP ‘Remedy’. They have supported John Smith, Gilmore & Roberts and Ben Ottewell, and played main stage shows at Purbeck Valley Folk Festival, Wimborne Minster Folk Festival and Fête de la Musique Genève in Switzerland. Roswell’s second EP ‘Come Home’, produced by Dan Wilde at Gladeside Studio, was released in February 2020, with tour dates at The Green Note in London, The Stables in Milton Keynes and The Shelley Theatre in Bournemouth. Post-pandemic, Jasmine and Zoё have returned to stages across the UK and will be starting work on a third record soon. Stay tuned
fields.excerpt: Roswell with support from Milton Hide.  In The Playhouse.  8 pm. Tickets £10
fields.title: Troubadours! Roswell + Milton Hide

fields.content:
Marky was born and raised in Poole, Dorset. He started teaching himself piano at 14.  By 18, whilst studying at The London College of Music, he was working as a resident piano player in bars and clubs. Taking requests and heckles. It's here he developed his flair for entertaining and an ability to connect with audiences and get them singing
Marky is a charismatic showman with a huge voice - which can cover musical theatre, jazz and rock- alongside piano chops which could make Jerry Lee Lewis blush.  Remarkyble.
fields.excerpt: 20.30.  Free entry
fields.title: Marky Dawson
